pages.text: This dimension is similar to the overworld, but the time stands still and there are some new $(l:e_entity_overview)NPCs/el. There are also some new $(l:e_structure_overview)Structures/el on the surface as well as underground.
To reach this dimension you need to right-click with a $(l:e_item_teleportation_crystal)Teleportation Crystal/el. You will spawn somewhere on the surface of this dimension.
